column4: How exactly do I enable usershares, I am attempting to share an entire external HD and it wont let me
a samba share? or nfs share?
did you at least ask first? :)

I waited 15 min first for help, even flagged several employees down and they all said they would be with me in minutes, I got impatient, I only had a few minutes, it too bad, I had 3 grand to spend.  Then of course I had to explain the live cd concept to them
